properties.areaDesc: Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Northwest Blue Mountains
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 8 at 1:38AM PST until February 8 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton OR
properties.description:
...WINTER STORM TO BRING IMPACTFUL SNOW TO AREA MOUNTAINS THROUGH
SATURDAY EVENING...

.A vigorous winter storm will move into the area today. A cold
front will lower snow levels leading to significant snow
accumulations for the Washington Cascades and Blue Mountains of
Oregon and Washington today and tonight.

* WHAT...Snow. The snow will become heavy at times. Total snow
accumulation will range from 8 to 14 inches.

* WHERE...In Washington, Northwest Blue Mountains. In Oregon,
Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon.

* WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Especially along
interstate 84 through the Meacham area. Gusty winds will create
drifting and blowing of snow reducing visibilities at times.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

Stay tuned to NOAA weather radio...social media for additional
updates.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING
